phrs.translation: 做事非常卖力气的人，做事勤奋的人（特别指做事过于卖力气以讨好上司的人）

sentences.sentence: He was eager to get into politics.
The company is eager to gain a foothold in Europe.
sentences.translation: 这家公司急于在欧洲取得一席之地。

sentences.sentence: He was eager to communicate his ideas to the group.
sentences.translation: 他急于把他的想法传达给小组。
